ModMetaData.name: Animals Logic
ModMetaData.author: Oblitus
ModMetaData.description: Several QoL fixes related to the animal behavior: — In caravan forming and trade interface adds tags to distinguish bonded, trained and pregnant animals. — Changes pack-able animals without a load to be considered a sellable chattel by the caravans. — Unforbids slaughtered animals. — Egg-layers are trying to find a sleeping spot or other animal bed in their allowed area to lay an egg. Unforbids eggs laid outside the home area. — Predators hunting your pawns (human-like or animals) are considered hostile by all your pawns and turrets. — Assign animal beds to specific animals. — Assign medical beds for animals. — (Optional) Prevents animals from eating random stuff. — (Optional) Lessens wildness penalty for training (but not taming) animals. — (Experimental) Animals have greater chance to fight back when attacked in melee.
